title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large skillet until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, Parmesan, and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the tikka masala spice for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry marinated chicken until cooked through.
In a large pan, melt butter and sauté onion until soft.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute.
Add remaining spices and cook until fragrant.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add cream and cooked chicken, simmer for 5 more minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Fresh romaine lettuce with parmesan cheese, croutons, and creamy Caesar dressing.
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Make dressing: blend garlic, anchovies, egg yolk, mustard, and lemon juice.
Slowly drizzle in olive oil while blending until creamy.
In a large bowl, toss lettuce with dressing.
Add croutons and toss gently.
Top with shaved Parmesan cheese.
Serve immediately.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned ground beef in crispy taco shells with lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning with water as directed.
Simmer until sauce thickens.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Fill each shell with seasoned beef.
Top with lettuce, cheese, salsa, sour cream, tomatoes, and onions.
Serve immediately with lime wedges.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and ginger.
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add broccoli and carrots, stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Add bell pepper and snap peas, continue stir-frying for 2 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and sesame oil, toss to coat.
Cook until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Garnish with sesame seeds and serve over rice.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Soft and chewy cookies loaded with chocolate chips and baked to perfection.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cream together butter and both sugars until fluffy.
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually blend dry ingredients into wet ingredients.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before transferring to wire rack.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Italian pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and fresh basil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C) with pizza stone if available.
Roll out pizza dough to desired thickness.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over dough, leaving a border for crust.
Arrange mozzarella slices over sauce.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Remove from oven and top with fresh basil leaves.
Slice and serve hot.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese with olive oil and herbs.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cucumbers, tomatoes, onion, and olives.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over vegetables and toss gently.
Add feta cheese cubes on top.
Let salad marinate for 10-15 minutes before serving.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.
